LanguageData.TuskPot.label: 弯牙盆
LanguageData.TuskPot.description: Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.

LanguageData.TuskPot_Blueprint_Install.label: tusk pot (蓝图)
LanguageData.TuskPot_Frame.label: tusk pot (建造中)

LanguageData.PlantPot.label: plant pot
LanguageData.PlantPot.description: A plant pot that can hold decorative flowers to improve the mood of people nearby.

LanguageData.PlantPot_Blueprint_Install.label: plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PlantPot_Frame.label: plant pot (building)

LanguageData.PentaPlantPot.label: 五角盆
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot.description: Roses are red, violets are blue, we love our Penta Pot, and so will you!

LanguageData.Storage_WoodenPalletSmall.label: 置物架
LanguageData.Storage_WoodenPalletSmall.description: The pallet will allow various bulk resources, such as metal and wood, to be stacked much denser than the ground would otherwise allow.
LanguageData.Storage_WoodenPalletSmall_Frame.label: pallet (建造中)
LanguageData.Storage_WoodenPalletSmall_Frame.descript: The pallet will allow various bulk resources, such as metal and wood, to be stacked much denser than the ground would otherwise allow.
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig.label: 箕斗
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig.description: Skips are heavy-duty, industrial grade storage devices, allowing bulk resources such as metal and wood to be stacked denser, even denser than the pallet.
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig_Blueprint.label: skip (蓝图)
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig_Frame.label: skip (建造中)
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig_Frame.description: Skips are heavy-duty, industrial grade storage devices, allowing bulk resources such as metal and wood to be stacked denser, even denser than the pallet.
LanguageData.Pot.label: 罐子
LanguageData.Pot.description: A big pot made of wood, metal or ceramics; used to preserve food. Slows rotting process by 25%. Up to 4 items.

LanguageData.Pot_Blueprint_Install.label: pot (蓝图)
LanguageData.Pot_Frame.label: pot (建造中)
LanguageData.Pot_Frame.description: A big pot made of wood, metal or ceramics; used to preserve food. Slows rotting process by 25%. Up to 4 items.

LanguageData.Basket.description: A basket made of leather or textile. Used to store various things inside. Up to 5 items.

LanguageData.ClutterShelf.label: 架子

LanguageData.RefrigeratedTrayRack.label: 冰箱
LanguageData.RefrigeratedTrayRack.description: Stores food. Up to 5 items. This track rack requires power in order to keep food refrigerated.

LanguageData.ClutterSmallServingTable.label: 服务台
LanguageData.ClutterSmallServingTable.description: A small table that is used for storing all kinds of meals. Up to 5 items. Decrease rotting process.

LanguageData.ClutterSmallServingTable_Frame.descripti: A small table that is used for storing all kinds of meals. Up to 5 items. Decrease rotting process.
LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet.label: 医药箱
LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet.description: Stores medicine and raw medical ingridients; prevents deterioration. Up to 5 items. Decrease rotting process.

LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet_Frame.label: medicine cabinet (建造中)
LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet_Frame.descriptio: Stores medicine and raw medical ingridients; prevents deterioration. Up to 5 items. Decrease rotting process.
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer.label: 军用箱
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer.description: Stores weapons, weapon parts, weapon crates, ammo and apparel; prevents deterioration. Up to 7 items.

LanguageData.TorchLamp.label: torch lamp
LanguageData.TorchLamp.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be refueled. \n\n产出：a small amount of heat.

LanguageData.WallTorch.label: 火把（墙）
LanguageData.WallTorch.description: A wall mounted torch for lighting an area. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Not a good source of heat. Must be placed on a wall.
